DOC.brief_summary: The aim study test feasibility acceptability internet-based Cognitive Behaviour Therapy ( CBT ) person diagnose bipolar disorder , type II . The idea treat residual depressive symptom well use psychoeducation improve prognosis . Each participant personal therapist provide guidance support throughout treatment .
DOC.brief_title: Internet-based Cognitive Behaviour Therapy ( CBT ) Persons Diagnosed With Bipolar II
DOC.criteria: A diagnosis bipolar disorder type II Mild moderate depressive symptom 18 year age Stable medication mood stabiliser Access internet Diagnosis psychosis Having receive psychiatric inpatient care past year Ongoing psychotherapy Previous manic episode Previous suicide attempt Previous parasuicidal behavior document patient record ( e.g . selfinjury )
